Survey Job Classes¶

Billing¶

class SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.SurveyJob.Billing : public SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.IDatabaseWrapper¶

This class is a wrapper for a list of BillingItems and LineItems.

This class implements the IDatabaseWrapper interface to facilitate easier database operations with the two internal lists. When any of the interface methods are called, each list is iterated and depending on the method called, the objects are inserted, updated, or deleted from the database.

The objects in each list also implement the IDatabaseWrapper class so they can also be inserted, updated, or deleted from the database easily.

Public Functions

List<BillingItem> GetBillingItems ()¶

Get a list of BillingItem objects associated with this Billing object.

Return

A list of BillingItems.

List<LineItem> GetLineItems ()¶

Get a list of LineItem objects associated with this Billing object.

Return

void SetObjects ()¶

Set this Billing object’s associated objects based on the ids in BillingIds and LineItemIds.

string GetBillingIds ()¶

Get the billing item ids as a comma seperated list of ids.

Return

A comma seperated list of billing item ids.

string GetLineItemIds ()¶

Get the line item ids as a comma seperated list of ids.

Return

A comma seperated list of line item ids.

The line item to add.

Add a collection of LineItem objects to this Billing object.

Param lItems

The collection of items to add.

Param clearListFirst

Should the internal list be cleared first?

Remove, if it exists, a line item from this Billing object’s internal list.

Param item

Add, if not already present, a line item id to the LineItemIds string.

Param id

The id to add.

Remove, if it exists, a line item id from the LineItemIds string.

Param id

The id to remove.

BillingItem¶

class SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.SurveyJob.BillingItem : public ExpandableObjectConverter, public SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.IDatabaseWrapper¶

This class represents a single billing item for a survey job. A billing item has a field rate and time as well as an office rate and time.

There is also an associated date that corresponds to when the entry was created.

This class implements the IDatabaseWrapper interface to facilitate easier database operations.

Public Functions

void SetObjects ()¶

Set this billing item’s objects with those from the database based on the Ids. Each database operation runs on a seperate thread.

DatabaseError Insert ()¶

Defines the behaviour for inserting the object’s data into the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Update ()¶

Defines the behaviour for updating the object’s data in the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Delete ()¶

Defines the behaviour for deleting the object from the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

Properties

string Description { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

A description of this billing item.

Rate FieldRate { get; set; }¶

The Rate that should be associated with the Field time.

int FieldRateId { get; set; }¶

The id in the database of the FieldRate.

Rate OfficeRate { get; set; }¶

The Rate that should be associated with the Office time.

int OfficeRateId { get; set; }¶

The id in the database of the OfficeRate.

TimeSpan FieldTime { get; set; }¶

The time entry for this billing item’s field time. This is used in conjuction with the FieldRate to determine the field bill.

TimeSpan OfficeTime { get; set; }¶

The time entry for this billing item’s office time. This is used in conjuction with the OfficeRate to determine the office bill.

DateTime AssociatedDate { get; set; } = DateTime.Now¶

The date this entry was created.

bool IsValidItem { get; set; }¶

Checks the description, the field rate, and the office rate to ensure this is a valid billing item.

LineItem¶

class SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.SurveyJob.LineItem : public SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.IDatabaseWrapper¶

This class represents a single line item for a survey job. A line item is simply an extra charge to bill for on this survey.

Multiple line items can be added to a survey using the Billing class.

This class implements the IDatabaseWrapper interface to facilitate easier database operations.

Public Functions

LineItem (decimal amount, string description, double taxRate = 0.0)¶

Create a new line item with the necessary information.

Param amount

The amount for this charge.

Param description

A brief description of the charge.

Param taxRate

Any applicable tax that should be considered for this charge.

LineItem (int id, decimal amount, string description, double taxRate = 0.0)

Create a new line item with the necessary information.

Param id

The id of the row in the database.

Param amount

The amount for this charge.

Param description

A brief description of the charge.

Param taxRate

Any applicable tax that should be considered for this charge.

DatabaseError Insert ()¶

Defines the behaviour for inserting the object’s data into the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Update ()¶

Defines the behaviour for updating the object’s data in the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Delete ()¶

Defines the behaviour for deleting the object from the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

Properties

decimal Amount { get; set; }¶

The amount in US dollars to charge for this line item.

string Description { get; set; }¶

A brief description about this charge.

double TaxRate { get; set; } = Settings.Default.DefaultTaxRate¶

Any applicable tax to add to the total for this line item.

decimal SubTotal { get; set; }¶

Get a value representing the subtotal for this line item. The subtotal is calculated using the Amount and the TaxRate.

bool IsValidLineItem { get; set; }¶

Get a value indicating if this is a valid billing line item.

A valid line item is one whose amount is not $0.00 and has a description.

Rate¶

class SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.SurveyJob.Rate : public ExpandableObjectConverter, public SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.IDatabaseWrapper¶

This class represents a single rate.

A rate is associated with a BillingItem and is used to determine how much to bill.

This class implements the IDatabaseWrapper interface to facilitate easier database operations.

Public Functions

DatabaseError Insert ()¶

Defines the behaviour for inserting the object’s data into the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Update ()¶

Defines the behaviour for updating the object’s data in the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Delete ()¶

Defines the behaviour for deleting the object from the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

Properties

string Description { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

A brief description of the the service or product this rate represents.

decimal Amount { get; set; } = 0.00m¶

The dollar amount (USD) associated with this rate.

TimeUnit TimeUnit { get; set; } = TimeUnit.Hour¶

The TimeUnit describing how often this rate should be billed. The default is TimeUnit.Hour (per hour).

bool TaxIncluded { get; set; } = true¶

Should tax be included in the final amount for this rate?

bool IsValidRate { get; set; }¶

Get a value indicating if this is a valid rate. A valid rate is one whose Description is not “N/A” and Amount is not 0.00.

Survey¶

class SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.SurveyJob.Survey : public ExpandableObjectConverter, public SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.IDatabaseWrapper¶

This class represents a full Survey job. Objects are added to this job using the various properties present in this class.

This class implements the IDatabaseWrapper interface to facilitate easier database operations.

Public Functions

void SetObjects ()¶

Set the objects in this survey to those from the database based on the various ID properties.

Gets the survey’s Client, County, Realtor, TitleCompany, Location, any files associated with this job, the notes, and the billing objects.

All database operations here run on a seperate thread.

void AddFile (CFile file)¶

Add a new file to the associated file list.

Param file

The file to add.

void AddFiles (ICollection<CFile> files)¶

Adds the files to the associated file list if they are not already present.

Param files

The files to add.

void SetFiles (ICollection<CFile> files)¶

Overwrites the files list to be the specified files instead.

Param files

The files to set as the new Files list.

void RemoveFile (CFile file)¶

Remove a file, if it exists, from the associated file list.

Param file

The file to remove.

void RemoveFiles (ICollection<CFile> files)¶

Remove all files in files from Files.

Param files

The collection of files to remove.

void ClearFiles ()¶

Clear this survey’s associated files and file ids.

void AddFileId (int id)¶

Add a new file id to the id list.

Param id

The id to add.

void RemoveFileId (int id)¶

Remove a file id from the id list.

Param id

The id to remove.

void AddNote (DateTime time, string newNote)¶

Add a new note to the Notes dictionary. If the key already exists, it is updated instead.

Param time

The timestamp for the note (key) to add.

Param newNote

The notes contents (value) to add.

void AddNote (string newNote)

Add a new note the Notes dictionary using the current DateTime.Now value as the key.

Param newNote

The notes contents (value) to add.

void RemoveNote (DateTime time)¶

Remove, if it exists, the note specified by the DateTime key.

Param time

The timestamp for the note (key).

bool ParseNotes (string notesString)¶

Parses a string containing notes and times into the appropiate dictionary in this class.

A note is specified by a dateTime in ticks (i.e., 637539336310000000) followed by a string; these two components are seperated by /**/

Param notesString

The string containing the notes and time information.

string GetNotesString ()¶

Get the string value of the Notes dictionary. The notes are seperated by /**/.

Return

The complete notes string ready to be saved to the database.

DatabaseError Insert ()¶

Defines the behaviour for inserting the object’s data into the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Update ()¶

Defines the behaviour for updating the object’s data in the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Delete ()¶

Defines the behaviour for deleting the object from the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

Properties

string JobNumber { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

The job number assigned to this survey.

string Description { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

A brief description for this survey.

string AbstractNumber { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

The abstract number where this survey is located.

string SurveyName { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

The name of the survey this job is located in.

DateTime LastUpdated { get; set; } = DateTime.Now¶

The timestamp this survey was last updated.

string Subdivision { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

The subdivisions name, if any, this job is located in. If this is specified, the LotNumber, BlockNumber, and SectionNumber should also be specified.

string LotNumber { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

The lot number in the subdivision this job is located at.

string BlockNumber { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

The block number in the subdivision this job is located at.

string SectionNumber { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

The section number in the subdivision this job is located at.

double Acres { get; set; }¶

The number of acres this survey is for.

Client Client { get; set; } = new Client()¶

The wrappers.Client object associated with this survey.

int ClientID { get; set; }¶

The id of the Client associated with this survey.

County County { get; set; }¶

The wrappers.County object associated with this survey.

int CountyID { get; set; }¶

The id of the County associated with this survey.

Realtor Realtor { get; set; } = new Realtor()¶

The wrappers.Realtor object associated with this survey.

int RealtorID { get; set; }¶

The id of the Realtor associated with this survey.

TitleCompany TitleCompany { get; set; } = new TitleCompany()¶

The wrappers.TitleCompany object associated with this survey.

int TitleCompanyID { get; set; }¶

The id of the TitleCompany associated with this survey.

Address Location { get; set; } = new Address()¶

The Address object associated with this survey.

int LocationID { get; set; }¶

The id of the Location associated with this survey.

string FileIds { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

The comma seperated list string of file ids associated with this survey.

List<CFile> Files { get; set; } = new List<CFile>()¶

The list of CFile objects associated with this survey.

int NumOfFiles { get; set; }¶

Get the total number of files associated with this survey job.

bool HasFiles { get; set; }¶

Get a value indicating whether this survey job has files associated with it.

Billing BillingObject { get; set; } = new Billing()¶

The Billing object associated with this survey.

string TotalFieldTime { get; set; }¶

Get the total field time as represented by the BillingObject.

string FieldAmount { get; set; }¶

Get the total dollar amount to bill for the field time as represented by the BillingObject.

string TotalOfficeTime { get; set; }¶

Get the total office time as represented by the BillingObject.

string OfficeAmount { get; set; }¶

Get the total dollar amount to bill for the office time as represented by the BillingObject.

string BillingTotal { get; set; }¶

Get the total dollar amount to bill for all items (office time, field time, and additional line items) as represented by the BillingObject.

Dictionary<DateTime, string> Notes { get; set; } = new Dictionary<DateTime, string>()¶

The dictionary of notes associated with this survey job. The key of the dictionary is a timestamp representing when the note was created. The value is the note’s contents (up to 4,000 characters).

string NotesString { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

The complete string of notes ready to be saved to the database or parsed into Notes by ParseNotes(string).

bool IsValidSurvey { get; set; }¶

Get a value that indicates if this is a valid Survey object.

A valid survey has a valid client, county, job number, and description at the very least.
